patthana8.54:1.1: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.54:2.1: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhañceva nano ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭho ceva nano ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.54:3.1: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca naasaṅkiliṭṭhañceva nano ca kilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
